name: accessibility-checker-engine
description: IBM Equal Access Accessibility Checker Engine

scripts.build-node: npm run prebuild && npx webpack --config webpack-node.config.js && shx cp dist/index.d.ts dist/ace-node.d.ts
scripts.build-node-debug: npm run prebuild && npx webpack --config webpack-node-debug.config.js && shx cp dist/index.d.ts dist/ace-node-debug.d.ts
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && shx cp dist/index.d.ts dist/ace.d.ts
scripts.build-debug: npm run prebuild && npx webpack --config webpack-debug.config.js && shx cp dist/index.d.ts dist/ace-debug.d.ts
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build-node && npm run build-debug && npm run build-node-debug && npm run build:help && shx cp ./src/package.json ./dist/ && shx cp ./README-NPM.md ./dist/README.md
